title: FS/FT: Jake Thielman American Beauty SGC20. SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS/FT: Jake Thielman American Beauty SGC20. SOLD
posts.post_content:
Time to let this one go. Very tough card to find. Pop reports have only seen 2 graded total and I know there is an additional PSA 4 that didn't have a back designation from PSA and sold about 6 years ago.

Very tough card to get regardless.  And a semi-popular player to boot.

Asking $SOLD shipped. But will also entertain trades for EPDGs I need.

[IMG]http://i856.photobucket.com/albums/ab121/thromdog/Available/aThielmanABSGC20.jpg[/IMG]
